pageProduct.name: Zostrix Topical Analgesic Cream 45g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Zostrix Topical Analgesic Cream 45g

Zostrix Capsaicin 0.025%. May be useful as an adjunct in the temporary relief of pain associated with arthritis. May be useful for the treatment of post-herpetic neuralgia (pain following shingles).

Warnings

Avoid getting in eyes or on broken or irritated skin. If condition worsens, or if symptoms persist for more than 28 days in the case of arthritis (14 days with post-herpetic neuralgia), or clear up and occur again within a few days, discontinue use of this product and consult your doctor. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Capsaicin 0.025% w/w. Also contains benzyl alcohol 1% w/w as a preservative.
